Career

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”25px” text_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” width=”56%” width_tablet=”78%” width_phone=”89%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”15px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.7″ module_alignment=”center” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|70|70|100|4|0|-4″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Career-at-GMCI-Pvt-Ltd.jpg” title_text=”Career at GMCI Pvt Ltd” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ scroll_horizontal_motion_enable=”on” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|100|100|100|3|0|-3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”49px||3px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.7″ module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|auto|2px|auto||” custom_padding=”6px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”80px” text_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”50px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Who are we?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Times New Roman||||||||” text_text_color=”#878787″ text_font_size=”24px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.4em” width=”61%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”10px|||||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”6%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Are you looking to work with enthusiasts who are tackling the game-changing challenges of min-ing and beyond? At GMCI, we deliver a transparent atmosphere in which brilliant thoughts are given a chance to shine and everybody is willing to lend a helping hand. Join us and transform the unknown.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ specialty=”on” module_class=”fully_special” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”94%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”5px||7px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ specialty_columns=”2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_row_inner _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”46px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column_inner saved_specialty_column_type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”80px” text_line_height=”1.2em” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||-3px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Who you are?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Times New Roman||||||||” text_text_color=”#6d6d6d” text_font_size=”24px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.4em” width=”100%” custom_padding=”18px|||||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You are talented, hardworking and motivated individual coming from diverse backgrounds. You are up to take any challenge, a passionate individual to take the company forward.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_2″ saved_specialty_column_type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.2em” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||-3px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Your actions matter

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Times New Roman||||||||” text_text_color=”#6d6d6d” text_font_size=”18px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.4em” width=”100%” custom_padding=”18px|||||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Your actions today have an impact on the world tomorrow. Join us to explore your potential and make a difference to the world tomorrow.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_2″ saved_specialty_column_type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.2em” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||-3px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Teamwork

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Times New Roman||||||||” text_text_color=”#6d6d6d” text_font_size=”18px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.4em” width=”100%” custom_padding=”18px|||||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Always treat each well other and work together. We are dedicated to an inclusive environment where people feel comfortable being themselves.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_2″ saved_specialty_column_type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.2em” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||-3px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Get to the right level

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Times New Roman||||||||” text_text_color=”#6d6d6d” text_font_size=”18px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.4em” width=”100%” custom_padding=”18px|||||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Honesty is the foundation. Speak to your conscience. It’s easier to be frank than the sugar coat.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_2″ saved_specialty_column_type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.2em” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||-3px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Times New Roman||||||||” text_text_color=”#6d6d6d” text_font_size=”18px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.4em” width=”100%” custom_padding=”18px|||||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”2%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Professional development :
